Title: New York, New York
Writer: Earl Mac Rauch (screenplay), Mardik Martin (screenplay), Earl Mac Rauch (story)
Actors: Liza Minnelli, Robert De Niro, Lionel Stander, Barry Primus
Plot: An egotistical saxophonist and a young singer meet on V-J Day and embark upon a strained and rocky romance, even as their careers begin a long, up-hill climb.
Awards: Nominated for 4 Golden Globes. Another 2 wins & 2 nominations.
